channel.title: Few Questions [Shard]
channel.description:
Ok, well recently people have been repping a server called "Shard Revolutions" and I was wandering what it has on it and if it is download worthy?
These questions i'd like to have answered
1. Does it have specials? 2. Is it stable? 3. Does it have more download value then a DeltaScape leech? 4. Is the server neat and handled or sloppy and everything smashed into client.java.?
Can I get some answers please?

item.title: Few Questions [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

  1. Does it have specials?

  2. Is it stable?

  3. Does it have more download value then a DeltaScape leech?

  4. Is the server neat and handled or sloppy and everything smashed into client.java.?

  5. No.

  6. Hell YES!

  7. Hell Yes!

  8. Yes, everything is neat.

I used this for a while, it’s really good. It’s not like the other servers with admin zone and all that shit

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Ok, thanks JC. But oh yea, can’t wait to write specials they are the most boring and annoying part.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:2, topic:280944”]dude go n find out yourself…
y even wate your time and poste this shit[/quote]
Don’t post if you’re not going to help.

@Topic:

  1. It has no specials because it is blankish.
  2. None of the sources on here are actually stable, but compared to Delta, yes.
  3. Yes, definitely.
  4. I think the client class is split into various other classes.

Read full topic
